lab_managers.name: Fadhel Ben Ettouil, Ph, D.
lab_managers.research_summary: Driven Research Associate and Lab Manager with over 20 years of experience in research and laboratory oversight, adept at improving processes and leading teams to achieve project timelines. Expert in thermal spray processes (Plasma Spray, HVOF, HVAF, Cold Spray, ...) and development of functional and protective coatings (TBC, EBC, Coatings for Erosion-Corrosion Protection, ...).
